front.title: A well-known URI for publishing ECHConfigList values.

abstract.t: We propose use of a well-known URI at which an HTTP origin can inform an authoritative DNS server, or other interested parties, about this origin's Service Bindings, i.e. its "HTTPS" DNS records. These instructions can include Encrypted ClientHello (ECH) configurations, allowing the origin to publish and rotate its own ECH keys.
